Uses of Class
cds.java.project.concurrent.ConcurrentQueue

  • Packages that use ConcurrentQueue 
    Package Description
    cds.java.project.actors  
    cds.java.project.workshop  

    • Uses of ConcurrentQueue in cds.java.project.actors

      Fields in cds.java.project.actors declared as ConcurrentQueue 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> SantaClaus.christmasGiftPipe
      Pipe that goes from the reindeer squad to Santa's place; all reindeer put their packed gifts in it, and on his side, Santa is taking them alone, one by one, and putting them in his big Christmas bag
      private ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> Reindeer.christmasGiftPipe
      Pipe that goes between the reindeer and Santa Claus; all reindeer put their packed gifts in it, but Santa Claus has to take them one by one and add them in his bag
      private ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> Reindeer.factoryGiftQueue
      Queue in which presents are stored at the factory level; the reindeer takes raw presents from it and then packs them
      Methods in cds.java.project.actors that return ConcurrentQueue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> SantaClaus.getChristmasGiftPipe()
      Getter method for the pipe shared by reindeer and Santa
      ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> Reindeer.getChristmasGiftPipe()
      Getter for the pipe that connects it to Santa's work room
      ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> Reindeer.getFactoryGiftQueue()
      Getter for the queue in which the assigned factory stores the gifts made by elves
      Methods in cds.java.project.actors with parameters of type ConcurrentQueue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SantaClaus.setChristmasGiftPipe(ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> christmasGiftPipe)
      Setter method for the pipe shared by reindeer and Santa
      void Reindeer.setChristmasGiftPipe(ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> christmasGiftPipe)
      Setter for the pipe that connects it to Santa's work room
      void Reindeer.setFactoryGiftQueue(ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> factoryGiftQueue)
      Setter for the queue in which the assigned factory stores the gifts made by elves
      Constructors in cds.java.project.actors with parameters of type ConcurrentQueue 
      Constructor and Description
      Reindeer(int reindeerIndex, ToyFactory assignedFactory, ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> christmasGiftPipe, java.util.concurrent.Semaphore serviceThreadSemaphore)
      Constructor of Reindeer; setting the reindeer index, the toy factory in which he will work, the pipe that goes to Santa and the Semaphore shared with the service thread; the current gift is set to null, the running flag is true and the boolean for the semaphore is false because the reindeer did not yet acquire it
      SantaClaus(int numberOfKids, ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> christmasGiftPipe)
      Constructor for the class that sets the number of kids and the shared pipe between Santa Claus and his reindeer; the running flag is set by default to true

    • Uses of ConcurrentQueue in cds.java.project.workshop

      Fields in cds.java.project.workshop declared as ConcurrentQueue 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> NorthPoleWorkshop.christmasGiftPipe
      Concurrent queue that plays the role of the christmas gift pipe that represents the mean of communication between the reindeer and Santa Claus
      private ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> ToyFactory.giftQueue
      Concurrent queue that holds all the presents that have been created by elves; this is the place from which reindeer take afterwards the presents and pack them
      Methods in cds.java.project.workshop that return ConcurrentQueue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> NorthPoleWorkshop.getChristmasGiftPipe()
      Getter method for the christmas gift pipe (concurrent queue between Santa Claus and reindeer)
      ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> ToyFactory.getGiftQueue()
      Getter method for the concurrent queue in which all created gifts are stored until reindeer take them
      Methods in cds.java.project.workshop with parameters of type ConcurrentQueue 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NorthPoleWorkshop.setChristmasGiftPipe(ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> christmasGiftPipe)
      Setter method for the christmas gift pipe (concurrent queue between Santa Claus and reindeer)
      void ToyFactory.setGiftQueue(ConcurrentQueue<ChristmasGift> giftQueue)
      Setter method for the concurrent queue in which all created gifts are stored until reindeer take them
